name: András Vargha
content:
András Vargha (born Budapest, 29 November 1949) is a Hungarian psychologist and statistician, head of the Institute of Psychology of the Károli Gáspár University of Reformed Church. His research field is psychometrics, on which he has held conferences.[1]
 As of May 2011, Vargha had 131 journal publications with an impact factor of 14050,[2] and has worked or continues to work as a reviewer with academic journals.[3]

András Vargha (born Budapest, 29 November 1949) is a Hungarian psychologist and statistician, head of the Institute of Psychology of the Károli Gáspár University of Reformed Church. His research field is psychometrics, on which he has held conferences.[1]
As of May 2011, Vargha had 131 journal publications with an impact factor of 14050,[2] and has worked or continues to work as a reviewer with academic journals.[3]

Notes and references[edit]


^ Szervezési és Vezetési Tudományos Társaság (SZVT) I. Országos Alkalmazott Pszichológiai PhD Konferencia, az első megnyitó beszédet Vargha András, a Tudományos Bizottság elnöke tartja, 2010 Archived 2010-11-09 at the Wayback Machine (Hozzáférés 2011. május 7.)

^ Országos Doktori Tanács, Vargha András (Hozzáférés 2011. május 7.)

^ Magyar Pszichológiai Szemlénél rovatvezető is volt 1991-1998-ig.
